description: In this, the final book in The Arkansas Valley Series, Chad comes to realize the very real benefits of answered prayer after he, his sister ,Becky and their long-time friend, Nate, are taken from their families and held for ransom. During the course of their harrowing experience, Chad realizes some of the things that had been keeping him from completely embracing the Lord and with a troubled heart he finds his way back into the fold. As the title suggests, his faith in the Lord is finally kindled and he comes to realize that he has been called to preach. Chad's continued adventures can be found in the pages of: The Cripple Creek Mining District Series where he establishes and Pastor's the first ever church to lay claim to the valley..
title:
Kindled Faith
      
          (The Arkansas Valley  #7)
